title: Ranc Utilities
description: General function library that prividing code and blueprint utility functions
longDescription:
Rancorous Utilities is a function library that provides a suite of general code and blueprint utility functions


The plugin is easily integratable into existing Unreal Engine projects and requires minimal setup. Simply add it as a plugin and for C++ projects include the necessary headers, and start utilizing the provided functionalities in your project.


Version 1.1 (Feb. 4. 2024) - Release notes:

  • 3 ways of selecting a random weighted items
  • Simple integer based priority queue (cost, not utility based)
  • MovementUtilityComponent - currently only has functionality to rotate to target location over a given time, useful for e.g. facing your attack direction



It is tested on Windows but I see no reason it shouldn't function on any platform.


Always find the most up to date version on github where you can also contribute if you like: https://github.com/RancorousGames/RancUtilities


If you want to support me consider checking out my other plugins

Trace Visualizer

Ranc Priority Task AI
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • interface ISortableElement that allows objects to be compared and sorted.
  • Sorting Library: A core feature of the plugin is the RancSortingLibrary, which includes functions to sort arrays of
  • ForceDestroyComponent: for destroying components on other actors from blueprints (default destroy component does not work outside owning actor)
  • TArray Wrapper: Provide a standardized way to store TArray within other data structures such as TMap in C++
  • More features added over time
  • Toggle bool - no longer need to get branch set every time
  • ThrottledLog - log stuff in tick but only have it print every X seconds
  • Easier versions of Increment, decrement integers
  • Vector functions: GetLocationInFrontOfActor, AddScaledVector
  • 3 ways of selecting a random weighted items
  • Simple integer based priority queue (cost, not utility based)
  • MovementUtilityComponent - currently only has functionality to rotate to target location over a given time, useful for e.g. facing your attack direction

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  • Â RancUtilities

Number of Blueprints: 0

Number of C++ Classes: 3

Network Replicated: Not needed

Supported Development Platforms: Win64 (Other platforms likely work but untested)

Supported Target Build Platforms: Win64 (Other platforms likely work but untested)

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NgFJkfS8GWNjrEPid0WCYStjzytaCDFjkdeGtIKXMvM/edit?usp=sharing
